about:
3 bhk flat for sale, semi furnished, covered car parking included.

Structure
Seismic iii compliant rcc framed concrete structure.

Wall
6" solid concrete block masonry for external walls and 4" concrete block masonry for internal walls.

Door
Main door : Teak wood frame & shutter with polish on sides, lock, handle, brass hinges, tower bolt and stopper and magic eye.
Other doors : Hard wood frame with compressed moulded wooden shutters.

Windows
Aluminium sliding powder coated windows, three track frames with glazed shutters in two tracks and mosquito mesh in one track with ms grill protection from outside.

Flooring
Quality vitrified tile flooring for living, dining,bed rooms and kitchen with 4" skirting; Antiskid ceramic tiles flooring in toilets; 1x1 matching ceramic antiskid tiles for balcony/utility areas

Kitchen
20 mm thick polished granite counter top platform with stainless steel sink and 2 ceramic dadoing above the granite platform; Provision for aqua guard point; Provision for washing machine in utility area.

Toilets
Ceramic glazed tiles dado upto 7-0" ht. Matching 50% coloured ewc with flush tank of hindware / parryware / cera or equivalent make; Health faucet in toilets; One hot & cold mixture unit for shower and all other fittings of crab tree/ jaquar/ess ess /marc / or equivalent make in toilets; Wash basin with pedestals; Concealed master control cock in each toilet shall be provided from inside; All sanitary and rain water pipes shall be suitable thickness for 6 kg/cm2 pressure outlet pipes; Provision for geyser & exhaust fan.

Painting
Obd paint for internal walls - Roller finish; Anti-Algal weather proof emulsion paint for external walls over plastered surface.

Electrical
One t.V / telephone point in the living and master bed room; Elegant modular electrical switch of anchor-Roma / m.K/ schinedair/ equivalent make; I.S.I mark p.V.C conduits concealed in the walls; Quality copper cables; Adequate number of light, fan, 5 amps 15 amps plug points shall be provided; Mcb for each room and elcb for the flat shall be provided.

Water supply
Bore well/municipal water

Terrace
Overhead tank, parapet wall, staircase headroom, lift machine room and water proof treated terrace/roof.

Basement
Concrete flooring for parking, under ground sump, electrical room, generator room, security room, lift-Well

Sanitary / rwp
Disposal to the stp/ municipal sewage line; Internal soil and waste water and rain water pipes are pvc lines.

Power
5 kw power supply from kseb and 1 kva generator backup for each apartment unit

Anti-Termite treatment
Shall be done for soil & woodwork.

Lift
Two 8 passengers lift and one 13 passengers lift of reputed make with generator backup.

Common area light fittings
One time.

Intercom
One extension to each flat.

Security
24 hours security with surveillance through cctv.

Swimming pool
Multipurpose hall
Intercom
Provision for broadband connection
Facility for car wash

about:
Residential apartment for sale in sfs cyber gateway eden, kazhakootam, trivandrum, kerala 

Constructed to suit your lifestyle, this residential apartment provides simple, functional, private and light-Filled spaces for the residents. It is widely distributed in 2 spacious bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, kitchen, bright and spacious hall with 2 balconies to keep the house light filled and ventilated. There are ample open spaces for the residents to move around freely. Available on the 16th floor, the property has a great view of the pool. 
The property being an unfurnished unit comes with basic fittings like lights, fans and bathroom fixtures. The complex hosts all the modern amenities like club house/community center, fitness center/gym, intercom facility, lift(S), park, rain water harvesting, swimming pool and piped-Gas and lift and power back up. The residential complex has 24 hour security with guards and cctv cameras. 

Ready to occupy, vaastu compliant 2bhk apartment with good view on the 16th floor on vettur road near kazakkutam. Near to technopark and other it companies. Good for investmentnnwe are the proud owners of this 2 bhk apartment available in sfs cyber gateway eden, kazhakootam, trivandrum. This apartment is a 0-1 year old property, priced approximately at rs. 5043 per sq. Ft. Or rs. 60,00,000. It is a resale and a ready to move in apartment. The unit is located on the 16th floor and has a super built-Up area of 1190 sq. Ft. It is a feng shui/vaastu compliant. It has 2 bathroom(S) and 1 balcony(S). The ownership is freehold type. The property offers the best in class facilities such as club house/community center, fitness centre/gym, intercom facility, lift(S), park, rain water harvesting, swimming pool and piped-Gas. It is positioned in a gated society. The apartment has 1 covered parking
Water and electricity will be available uninterrupted along with boring supply of water. The residents will have access to 1 covered car parking. 

Basic facilities like banks, atm, medical facility, market areas, schools and transport facility all are with in an easy reach from the property.  
Strategically located in the heart of the city the residential apartment is situated close to major landmarks  making the property highly accessible. 
Click on “contact owner” to grab this deal.
